title: The difference between D and R
author: VD
content_html:
Rod Dreher sums it up:

The difference between the Democrats and the Republicans is the Dems will tax us to blow our money, and the Republicans will just put the shopping spree on a credit card.

And that’s pretty much it. They both love pointless wars with no plausible American interest, they both love the idea of electing a new people via migration and neither of them have any intention of reducing the size or scope of the federal government.

sums it up

The difference between the Democrats and the Republicans is the Dems will tax us to blow our money, and the Republicans will just put the shopping spree on a credit card.
And that’s pretty much it.  They both love pointless wars with no plausible American interest, they both love the idea of electing a new people via migration and neither of them have any intention of reducing the size or scope of the federal government.
